title: Spicy Shrimp with Taqueritos
instructions: Step 1. Using a mortar, crush the Taqueritos until finely ground and place them in a bowl.
Step 2. In a medium bowl, beat the egg with the milk, then add the flour, salt, and pepper.
Step 4. Dip the cleaned and dried shrimp into the milk, egg, and flour mixture.
Step 5. Place the shrimp in the hot oil and cook for 2 minutes until golden and crispy.
Step 7. Finely chop the pickles, capers, and parsley.
Step 8. In a bowl, mix the mayonnaise with the lemon juice, then add the chopped capers, pickles, and parsley.
Step 9. Chop the onion and garlic and incorporate them into the mixture.
Step 10. Add salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon of pickle juice, mix well, and it’s ready to accompany your spicy shrimp.
